PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14352018-11-22,  ,  ,  ISED,  , 
ActTextile Labelling Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Textile Labelling and Advertising Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TEXTILE LABELLING AND ADVERTISING REGULATIONS to (1) address some of the recommendations of the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to amend the Textile Labelling and Advertising Regulations to better reflect the legislative authority found under the Act; and, (2) enhance clarity of the regulations through technical “housekeeping” amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0253 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
